title: My account is still banned after 14 days
body: My account is still banned after the 14 day suspension, i cannot access chat, and also my play button is gray and i cannot press it, it even gives me the 14 day suspension message even though its two days past suspension now, I just need help regarding this, thank you.

replies.body: I'm not entirely sure if you were referring to this account or not, but this accounts ban isn't a time-based 14-day punishment but rather a permanent ban for excessive toxicity. If you're not sure why that happened, hit up the player behavior agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Hmmmm awkward. I did some deeper investigating to see when the punishments happened, and it looks like you were able to get into a game before the punishment was applied correctly, and then something happened in that game which caused another report to be sent which messed up that messaging somehow. I've got an agent working to get that messaging fixed up, and you're still welcome to reach out to them in that [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're not sure why this punishment was warranted.
